TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and resides in the village of GPE , GPE , GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the applicant , may be summarised as follows .
In DATE , the applicant instituted proceedings in ORG of GPE against the “ ORG - a ORG - owned enterprise - to recover unpaid salary for DATE .

On DATE , ORG found in favour of the applicant ( ORG городского суда PERSON области ) . The decision became effective on DATE and was sent for execution to ORG ( Отдел Государственной исполнительной службы Новогродовского городского управления юстиции ) . However , the decision was not executed , allegedly due to the failure of ORG to act , in not selling the property of ORG .

The applicant instituted proceedings in ORG of GPE against ORG for failure to execute the court decision in his favour . On DATE , ORG rejected the applicant ’s claim , finding no fault had been committed by ORG . The court stated that ORG had presented the decision of ORG of GPE of DATE to the respondent company , but was prohibited from enforcing the decision by selling the property of the mine , due to the bankruptcy proceedings which had been initiated against it .
On DATE , ORG dismissed the applicant ’s appeal . On DATE , the panel of CARDINAL judges of ORG of ORG of GPE rejected the applicant ’s request for leave to appeal .

On DATE , the ban on the forced sale of assets belonging to undertakings in which the ORG holds PERCENT of the share capital , was entrenched in the PERSON on the Introduction of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property .

Under LAW of the LAW on bankruptcy ( ORG відновлення платоспроможності боржника або визнання його банкрутом ORG ) , a commercial court is entitled to order a moratorium on debt recovery from a company subject to bankruptcy proceedings . The moratorium implies a prohibition on ORG to execute judgements against such a company .

The PERSON on the Introduction of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property ( ORG Про введення мораторiю на примусову реалiзацiю TIME ” ) aims at protecting ORG interests on the sale of assets belonging to undertakings in which the ORG holds PERCENT of the share capital .

A moratorium on the enforcement of judgment debts has been introduced until such time as the mechanism for the forced sale of the property of such undertakings has been improved . No time - limit has been set .
Section CARDINAL of that PERSON provides that the prohibition on the forced sale of property includes the execution of writs by ORG over property belonging to such companies .
The PERSON therefore stays the execution of all writs by ORG against the assets of undertakings in which the ORG holds PERCENT of the share capital .
